item.title: Light is obscured by vegetation problem, 4th October
item.description:
Streetlight Obscured by vegetation This is the Third time this year I have reported this with no action being taken! There are TWO overgrown trees that are completely surrounding and covering up the street light at the end of the lane that leads to the railway footpath crossing. I believe the trees maybe growing from the property of the bungalow next to the footpath therefore I’m not sure if it falls the the owner to cut the trees down and that is why you have ignored all my requests?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 4th October
item.description:
Grows up mothers wall. Can customer maintain it in. Is customer allowed to remove grass, weeds, shrubs and replace with a membrane and gravel. Customer is worried that the ivy will damage the wall. Will be done professionally if approved.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes Elmfield Road, 4th October
item.description:
Elmfield Road is widely used as part of school pickup and drop off as well as residents of both Elmfield Road and Elmfield Avenue. The Road is atrocious with potholes. Please can it be resurfaced as the temporary fixes made are not sustainable. Thankyou
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Bullingham Court, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 4th October
item.description:
feedback form forwarded by comms team 28.09.23 - Comments: I want to report an overgrown tree behind 10 guise avenue. The branches are very low, the tree sways considerably during moderate winds and I think it needs pruning. However when I selected the area on the map I could not go any further as the web page didn’t have any visible confirmation buttons to press?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers and sandbags that have been on Shakespeare Road for months, 4th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shakespeare Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham

item.title: Overgrown shrubbery and weeds, 3rd October
item.description:
Area of shrubbery and weeds over growing pathway and invading up our fence and into our garden at 6 Deer Park Road, Hucclecote. This is an ongoing problem, 20+ years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deer Park Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 3rd October
item.description:
Hi Scott, thanks for your email and the repair of the roundabout has indeed been completed which is great. The other problem area I mentioned, please see photo ( at the end of Hales Road) has yet to be resolved, maybe you could look into it. Many thanks
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
